home.tagline: Excellence, transparency, and innovation in the Brazilian agribusiness.
home.mission: To produce sustainable food and solutions, promoting economic, social, and environmental development.
home.vision: To be a reference in innovation, governance, and socio-environmental responsibility in global agribusiness.

investorRelations.title: Investor Relations
investorRelations.commitment: Multiagro is listed on the stock exchange, with governance practices aligned to the highest market standards.

esg.title: ESG and Sustainability
esg.description: Multiagro adopts advanced environmental, social, and governance management practices, integrating sustainability into all production and administrative processes.
